msbt.message: When I think about all I've seen on this island, I get sorta wistful. And that's a rare thing for me. Everyone here gave me lotsa laughs, so I feel I owe you some in return. Here's a little somethin' for you<10_10 />GAAAA-HA-HA!<10_9 />

I'd hate to leave without sayin' I appreciate everythin' you did to make me feel welcome here. I come on kinda strong, and I reckon there's a few 'round here that won't miss me none once I've moved on.Still, most probably won't forget ol' was on this island with 'em for a while. Gahaha!

Tomorrow I plan on packin' up, and the day after that I'll be off.<10_4 /> Reckon my move's comin' up fast. But when I think about a new island, and all the adventures ahead of me I get excited enough to jitterbug!
